Reviews.Title: quality control at issue here
Reviews.Author: C. W. Larimer "Dragonslayer"
Reviews.Content: Problem with connectors, had to cut connectors and hardwire. Lost couple of hours  removing soffit, troubleshooting and making hardwire connections . Not work the postage to return it.

Reviews.Title: Good product, good service, good value
Reviews.Author: Mississippi
Reviews.Content: Found these cables with a great price.  I was concerned about the quality when I ordered, but when they arrived (before the  stated delivery date) they were great quality and a great value.

ProductInfo.Features:
CCTV Surveillance Camera Power Cable w/ BNC Connector
BNC CCTV Cable eliminates need for video and power cables run to high-powered cameras
Mount your surveillance camera anywhere it's convenient without worrying about transmitting video far away
The CCTV Camera BNC Cable is a 25ft. CCTV Camera Cable that not only gets your surveillance images to your monitor or recorder.
Surveillance Video BNC Cable also gets power to the camera using the same cable, so running multiple cables becomes unnecessary.
ProductInfo.Name: CablesOnline 25ft CCTV BNC Security Camera Cable with DC Male/Female Power Connectors (PL-1025)
